full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN MA BRGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI BKA' BSRUNG THIG LE RTZAL MCHOG GI TSIM BSKANG RDEGS PA ZIL GNON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,('DI GSANG SNGAGS BRGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI NANG BYON CHEN DAM CAN THIG LE RTZAL MCHOG GI TSIM BSKANG 'DI NI, STOBS LDAN YID KHUL DANG, NUS LDAN RDO RJE RATNA GTER CHOG NI, THOR PA RNA BRGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI PHYAG LEN LTAR DU NYIN MTSAN DUS DRUG TU 'DON DGO BA'I CHED DU BTZUN GZUGS DHARM'A BADZRA GYIS SUG BRIS SU BKOD DO SA MA YA: RGYA: RGYA: RGYA: AiTHI BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
